p: For electron microscopy, a cultured broth sample of the M6 isolate was metalized with a thin gold film using sputtering device 54 (JFC-1100 E, JEOL, USA) for 12 min. SEM was performed with a JSM 5300 scanning electron microscope (JEOL, USA) at 20 kV in the Centre Laboratory, City of Scientific Research and Technological Applications.
